alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garland and central Hot Spring Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 550 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hot Springs Memorial Field, or near Hot Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Hot Springs National Park... Rockwell... Red Oak... Oaklawn Racetrack... Gulpha Gorge... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
